content: row 94 decrease 1 st at the beginning of row decrease 1 st at the end of the row 2 single_crochet row 95 12 single_crochet in the other bone ring end off attach thread on the side of the headband at row 6 row 1 chain 1 single_crochet in same place 1 single_crochet in each row across the side to row 90 chain 1 turn 85 single_crochet row 2 single_crochet in 1st single_crochet * skip next 2 single_crochet and 5 double_crochet in next single_crochet shell made skip 2 single_crochet and 1 single_crochet in next single_crochet * repeat from * to * across ending with a single_crochet in last single_crochet 14 shells end off attach thread on the other side of the headband repeat row 1 and row 2 on this side end off if you so desire you can sew beads at the base of the shell where all 5 double_crochet meet in the single_crochet this is optional would be easiest to do at this point though snood chain 31 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and in each chain across chain 1 turn row 1 single_crochet in 1st single_crochet chain 4 skip 2 single_crochet double_crochet in next single_crochet chain 5 8 times chain 4 skip next 2 single_crochet single_crochet in last single_crochet chain 1 turn row 2-5 single_crochet in 1st single_crochet chain 4 double_crochet in next double_crochet chain 5 8 times chain 4 single_crochet in last single_crochet chain 1 turn row 6- 7 repeat row 2 except you will chain 6 instead of 5 row 8-9 repeat row 2 except you will chain 7 instead of 5 row 10 -11 repeat row 2 except you will chain 8 instead of 5 row 12 repeat row 2 except you will chain 9 instead of 5 row 13 - 14 repeat row 2 except you will chain 8 instead of 5 row 15 - 16 repeat row 2 except you will chain 7 instead of 5 row 17 - 18 repeat row 2 except you will chain 6 instead of 5 row 18 repeat row 2 row 19 repeat row 2 except you will chain 4 instead of 5 row 20 repeat row 2 except you will chain 3 instead of 5 row 21 repeat row 2 except you will chain 2 instead of 5 row 22 repeat row 2 except you will chain 1 instead of 5 now fold the elastic cord in half single_crochet in next single_crochet crocheting through the loop of the folded elastic this securely attaches the elastic without a knot and you will work over two strands of elastic which will make this good and strong working over both strands of elastic single_crochet in each st across single_crochet in each st along the side single_crochet in each st across the top single_crochet in each st along the other side slip_stitch into beginning single_crochet draw elastic up till you have the desired size opening it doesn t have to be to snug as the head band will
